page.title: 05Major Routes.
page.content: Three main routes run parallel to each from north to south dividing the area. The development of the{M11 motorway}to the east of Stansted has reduced much time to reach London and Cambridge and has reduced pressure of vehicles through the village. The{B1383,}formally the{A11}runs through the centre of the village and although still quite busy at peak times,now sacrifices much of the heavy transport that the village inherited. Also running through the village and its countryside is the{main rail link from London to Cambridge and the North. {Stansted station}caters mainly for commuters travelling to the cities to their place of employment.It also allows easy access for families to travel to the attractions and sights in London.
